programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Roommate Rent Riot
programme.desc: Edgardo is accusing Arron of not paying his share of the rent, and is suing for what he thinks is owed.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Antique Repair Uproar
programme.desc: James has not paid Carlita for restoring an antique stove because he feels he was coerced into the repairs.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Money Tears Apart A Relationship
programme.desc: Kevin wants his ex-fiancé to pay him back for a loan he gave her to pay off her credit card.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: My Landlord Got Me Fired
programme.desc: Rachel is suing her landlord because she claims he forced her to lose her job.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Cat Rescue Turns Catastrophic
programme.desc: Joan is taking Sena to court after she gave away 5 cats she asked Sena to care for after Hurricane Sandy.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Roomate Rumble
programme.desc: Anthony wants David to pay over $1300 in rent and belongings he claims David trashed.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Car Sale Catastrophe
programme.desc: David is suing John after he was unable to get the car registered because he claims the title wasn't notarized.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: You Stole My Dog!
programme.desc: Christina is suing someone she's known for 8 years over money she claims he owes her for a French bulldog.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I Was A Wild Teen…Are You The Father Of My 2 Kids?
programme.desc: Wild party girl Hanna, met John when she was 19 and cheated on him twice, both times she conceived her 2 kids.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I Cheated With Your Dad…Is He My Baby's Father?
programme.desc: Don and his wife were happy to find their son isn't the father, but they’re back because Don might be!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: The DNA Results Are In! Do My Twins Have 2 Different Fathers?
programme.desc: The Paternity drama explodes on today’s MAURY! Could one woman’s twins really have 2 different fathers? It’s a one in a million DNA shot, but one that we have seen before on our show. Plus more wild DNA results on today’s MAURY!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Wild, Outrageous Winter Updates!
programme.desc: What happened after our guests left our show? Steve came to the show to find out if his 3 kids were his after Katie admitted to cheating with 5 men. Jordan called us from the delivery room because he was sure he didn’t father Chelsea’s baby!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: 6 Babies…6 DNA Tests…Which Man Is The Dad?
programme.desc: You'll see women desperate for the truth about the identity of their baby's fathers. You'll see men who are positive that there's no chance at all that they're the daddy.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: We're 15 and Having A Baby ... Is He Cheating?
programme.desc: These men have been accused of cheating but they swear they've been faithful. Now they've come to The MAURY Show to prove they're innocence. But, in order to clear their name, they're going to have to pass the lie detector test.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Family Secrets...Did My Husband Get My Sister Pregnant?
programme.desc: Is Kayla's man really sleeping with her teen cousin? We put them both to the lie detector test. But will Kayla be able to handle the shocking results? Then, Rebecca and Tyson both left their spouses to be together. But now Rebecca is worried that Tyson may be cheating on her with another woman. Is she getting what she deserves or just paranoid

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I'm Only 17 ... Is My Husband or Another Man My Baby's Dad?
programme.desc: One teenage girl is desperate to find out if her husband or another man is the father of her child. Maury's paternity results threaten to tear this young family apart. Plus more stories of paternity pandemonium!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Did My Man Cheat With My Teen Sister?
programme.desc: On Today's MAURY... The time for lying is over and the truth will be revealed. Who's right and who's about to get caught red handed! It's wild tales of cheating lovers forced to face the lie detector results on today's MAURYI

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Top 10 of 2010 ... Who Will Take Gold?
programme.desc: Take a look at some of the craziest DNA drama and cheating lovers. Who will be named THE guest of 2010?

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I Caught My Fiance in Bed with my Best Friend...Did he Cheat?
programme.desc: Kendra let Molly and her man Antonio move into their home, but found Molly in bed with her fiancé Chris! Then, Brandon must convince his fiancée and his mother that he is faithful! Later, is Lynette’s boyfriend Kendrae sleeping with neighbor Mesha?

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: My 16 Year Old Boyfriend Abuses Me!
programme.desc: Arthur slaps Tashina and tears off her clothes when he doesn't approve of her outfit, steals her money and berates her with humiliating name-calling. Why? Because he thinks he can.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: 6 Wild Teen Girls ... Desperate to Have Babies
programme.desc: These wild teen girls are positive that they're ready to be mothers. They say they'll stop at nothing to get pregnant. One girl says that she doesn't have to worry about how she'll support her child because she can go on welfare.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: DNA Mystery: Six Kids But You're Denying One? Unlock: Stop Breaking Phones to Cover Lies
programme.desc: Billy has doubts that he's the real father of his 3-year-old daughter; he accuses Tori of cheating; Maya says that her fiancée, Tatyana, took back the engagement ring she gave her; now she wants Karamo to unlock Tatyana's phone.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Mom, It's Me or Your Wife; DNA: Ghosted After Pregnancy
programme.desc: Malcom says his mother's wife is the cause of his toxic relationship with his mom; Shatay says her one-night stand has been a deadbeat father to her child.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: DNA Mystery: Surprise Special Guest; Sometimes I Hate My Daughter!
programme.desc: Marcus has doubts about being the father of Rashell's daughter after hearing rumors about Rashell being seen with different men, and Maury Povich helps put an end to the DNA mystery; Torianna says her mother abused her as a child.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock: Our Throuple Trouble; Unlock: Are You on Drugs?
programme.desc: Egypt's boyfriend invited another woman into their relationship, and things got messy; Bryant says Valerie is cheating with his friends, doing drugs, and selling her body to support her habit -- but he may be the one who is unfaithful.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: DNA: The 3 Kids Aren't Mine! / Out Of Control Teens
programme.desc: On today’s Karamo, Stephen received a random call from a woman claiming that his girlfriend, Martina, was having sex with her man. Next, Shannon and Latoya are best friends that have two out of control daughters.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: My Sisters Ruined My Wedding Weekend / DNA: Yours Or My Husband’s?
programme.desc: Brianna says her wedding was sabotaged by her sisters April and Kim. Plus, Lasha is positive that her husband is the father of her child, but she stepped outside of their marriage and had an affair with a man named Quintin.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock The Phone: The Tire Tracks Don’t Lie/ Family In Crisis: My Kids Are Leaving Me
programme.desc: Jessica wants to clear her name. She says her fiancé's sister has made baseless claims of infidelity.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: 5 Year Relationship…We’ve Never Met
programme.desc: Brietta reached out to the show to help her decide on whether to stay or not after finding Kertis cheating.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock: Our 4 Month Old Needs Us to Be Together
programme.desc: Zakirah is tired of the cheating accusations her boyfriend levies on her. Zakirah comes to unlock her phone.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: I Have Your 6 Kids, Why Are You With Her?/ Mom, You Don’t Respect Us!
programme.desc: Mandy believes she’s become the other woman. She’s at home raising their children while he’s having an affair.
